text: Arthur Brooks (4 October 1891 – 8 December 1976) was an English professional footballer who played as a forward. ==References== Category:1891 births Category:1976 deaths Category:People from Waveney District Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Yarmouth Town F.C. players Category:Gorleston F.C. players Category:Norwich City F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Doncaster Rovers F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Arthur Brooks (footballer)
